column4: Tesla to clarify how customers may disclose problems -U.S. agency
column5: WASHINGTON Tesla Motors Inc has agreed to revise its customer repair agreements to allow owners to report potential safety issues to U.S. auto safety regulators  a government spokesman said on Friday.

column4: Tesla will clarify customers may disclose vehicle problems -source
column5: WASHINGTON  June 10 Tesla Motors Inc  has agreed to revise its customer repair agreements to allow owners to report potential safety issues to U.S. auto safety regulators  a source briefed on the matter said.

column4: Intel gets mobile chip contract from Apple - Bbg
column5: Apple Inc's next iPhone will use modems chips from Intel Corp  replacing those made by Qualcomm Inc in some versions of the new smartphone  Bloomberg reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
